name: Verify POST request with valid URL and Blank data fields

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and Blank value in programName field
When  User sends POST request with Blank values in programName field in request body from "ProgramPOSTNoProgramName" and 0
Then  User gets Bad Request error message with status code "400" in response body with message Enter mandatory fields
